name: TirNaNogs's Feud
description:
You will have a 1 minute grace period before mobs start to spawn.

Theme:

As the last survivor of TirNaNogs's Feud, you set off to survive alone to save humanity as we know it, can you do it???

SURVIVE AS LONG AS YOU CAN.................

Controls:

Movement: wasd

Add Item to Inventory by walking over it.

Inventory Management : User numbers 1,2,3,4,5,6...

Attacking: With weapon in hand click the left button on your mouse to shoot or swing sword or use potion.

Click "E" to enter caves.
